item.title: Consecutive Numbers
item.description: A small project I made using loops in JavaScript. Creates a chain of numbers consecutively from 1 to the given number. See the Pen Consecutive Numbers by Heaven Lee (@heal33) on CodePen.

item.title: Bird Generator
item.description: Working with javascript loops and functions. Check it out here! View the code live on codepen. Had to troubleshoot for 3 hours because the birds were not being reset each time the button was clicked. After many hours of researching and trial and error, all I had to do was add html = “” at the end of the function to clear all birds images written to the html variable.

item.title: Lightbox Code
item.description: Credit goes to Team Treehouse for the course to create a lightbox using Jquery. This code will be used as a reference. Jquery //Problem: User when clicking on image goes to a dead end //Solution: Create an overlay with the large image - Lightbox var $overlay = $('<div id="overlay"></div>'); var $image = $("<img>"); var $caption = $("<p></p>"); // An image to overlay $overlay.append($image); // A caption to overlay $overlay.append($caption); // Add overlay $("body").

item.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
item.description: I just wanted a little more practice with JavaScript. I loved playing rock, paper, scissors (jan-ken-po) as a kid so I wanted to create that game in JavaScript and play against the computer.. As of right now, everything is done using prompts and alerts. Hopefully soon I’ll make it so the game can be played without them. But I feel as if I’m finally getting the hang of JavaScript. I was able to write this entire code by myself :)

item.title: Dice Game
item.description: Test your luck with this dice game! Check it out here! Roll the dice and see if you can roll the winning number. This game was created to practice with JavaScript Conditional Statements. See the Pen gaKMBg by Heaven Lee (@heal33) on CodePen.

item.title: Age in Seconds Calculator
item.description: What is your age in seconds? Check it out here A simple program that converts your age to seconds.
